name: Heroku Dyno Monitor
description: Detect, alert and trigger actions on Rxx, Hxx errors in your Heroku App

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your heroku account API key used for detecting apps and reading log streams. You will find your API Key under the account settings page

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME.description: Username for the admin account. Admin login is required to access the admin interface from where you can manage your alerts

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD.description: Password for the admin account. Must be at least 8 characters long

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL.description: Must be a valid email address. If superuser creation fails, you will have to create one manually

LOGGING_LEVEL.description: Default logging level of your app (optional)
